page.title: 15THE CATHOLIC CHURCH
page.content: Father John Maquire is our parish priest.{St Philip Evans}is fathers third parish,but his first parish as parish priest. A new catholic church was planned by the Archdiocese when the area was built.The actual architectural plans were started about 3 years ago.The original site of the church was going to be Roundwood. {On June 2nd 1982,POPE JOHN PAUl 2nd blessed the foundation stone.The church was started on October 15th 1984 and the foundation stone was laid on the{17th of May,by Archbishop John {Ward.}The church should be finished on the 23rd of August 1985.The first mass hopefully will be held on September 15th 1985.The actual consecration of the church will be in October.Whether mass times will change or we will have another priest as well,is to be seen.
